paragraphs.text: Stalin, Muhammad and Obama.
paragraphs.label: title

paragraphs.text: Pundits agonize over President Obama's resistance to calling Islamist terror "Islamist terror."
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: How can he not see the obvious?
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: How can he ignore the overwhelming and ever-increasing evidence?
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: How can he insist that his subordinates continue their buffoonish insistence that Islamist terror has nothing to do with Islam and that they--secularized Christians and non- observant Jews--know Islam's character better than Muslims themselves?
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: It's easy
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: President Obama and his commissars fit the longstanding pattern of behavior (insistence, denial, castigation) that the hard left has embraced for generations
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: In the mid-20th century, leftists, bereft of God and desperate for a new faith, insisted for decade after decade that Comrade Stalin was a paragon of political virtues and that the Soviet Union was Utopia
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: All reports of purges, terror, man-made famines and the Gulag were fabrications of capitalists and their servants
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: Even after Premier Khrushchev revealed Stalin's crimes to the world, hardcore leftists excused or ignored the truth, insisting still that Red terror wasn't terror and that Communism was a movement (religion?) of peace and progress, that humankind's hope still waited in the east
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: Only the fall of the Berlin Wall and the Soviet collapse briefly sobered a few on the extreme left--the milieu in which our president spent his youth and pre-presidency adulthood
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: But leftists need a utopia, a fantasy heaven on earth, to comfort them and to give their lives purpose
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: Robbed of the Soviet dream, the forlorn left was in need of a new redeemer
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: Welcome, Comrade Usama!
paragraphs.label: other

paragraphs.text: The left--and young Barack Obama -- already saw Islam as an oppressed religion, the noble faith of the wretched of the earth
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: while
paragraphs.label: no-unit

paragraphs.text: casting Christianity and Judaism in the role once occupied by capitalist imperialists: that of oppressors
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: Bin Laden gave the left a new torch to carry
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: While
paragraphs.label: no-unit

paragraphs.text: it remained necessary to condemn terrorism in public
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: the left simultaneously justified it in a globalized version of the Marxist construct of a class struggle
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: Really, didn't American deserve 9/11?
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: Islamism fit the left like a tailored glove
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: Just as Western Reds didn't need to endure life in the Soviet Union
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: ("Pass the foie gras, Comrade!")
paragraphs.label: no-unit

paragraphs.text: so today's leftwing cadres need not actually live in the Middle East or North Africa
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: From the comfort of Cambridge or the splendor of California's coast, they can rationalize radical Islam, a creed that would, if imported here, exterminate them as surely as Comrade Stalin would have purged the old American left
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: The staff of Charlie Hebdo?
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: Stalin would have killed those pranksters, too
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: The only difference is that "Uncle Joe" would have gotten them all
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: When you take the long view, it's disheartening(to put it mildly) that the Western left simply cannot live without dreaming of an impossible utopia to be imposed by one ideology or another on the rest of us
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: Radical Islam?
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: It's a "religion of peace."
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: Just as Soviet Communism was an ideology of peace, justice and brotherhood
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: So
paragraphs.label: no-unit

paragraphs.text: President Obama's just playing by the time-honored rules, substituting Muhammad for Josef Stalin or Mao: Never criticize the Party
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: Ignore the facts
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: If
paragraphs.label: no-unit

paragraphs.text: the facts can't be ignored
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: deny or twist them
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: No matter what, stick to the script
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: (let them laugh for now, they'll see soon enough
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: And anyone who strays one inch must be neutralized
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: whether as a Trotskyist yesteryear or slandered as an Islamophobe today
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: The left's existential bleakness and its resultant need to embrace horrid schemes for man-made heavens on earth form a peerless argument for humankind's need for religion
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: In the absence of belief there is only a desert of the soul
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: And Red terror gives way to Islamist terror
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: The Communist International cedes pride of place to the global caliphate
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: Comrade Stalin fades into Comrade Muhammad
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: Truth is malleable
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: Facts are nuisances to be exterminated, along with troublesome people
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: Middle-class notions of freedom must be shouted down
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: The rule of the intellectuals must be imposed
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: Never, ever criticize the cause
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: Deny everything
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: Never forget that Islam's a religion of peace
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: The future is ours, Comrades
paragraphs.label: assumption
